about_the_game:
X-Mutation: Master the Mutation Combat

Developed by just two dedicated creators, X-Mutation is a hardcore top-down rogue-lite 3D action game that challenges the limits of your tactical and strategic skills. As a subject of a relentless biological experiment, transform your body into formidable weapons to survive against the monstrous hordes from the Otherworld.

Dynamic Combat and Strategic Mastery

Arm yourself with a selection of over 100 mutations, configuring up to four weapons and five passive abilities to tailor a combat style that thrives on smart decisions and strategic planning. Every choice impacts your survival, urging you to optimize your approach against increasingly difficult odds. Progress in battles earns you talent points, which strategically enhance abilities on a dynamically generated talent map, boosting stats and unlocking permanent buffs for your character.

Innovative Combat Mechanics and Tactical Gameplay

X-Mutation blends complex dungeon crawler systems into a top-down action format, featuring over 30 distinct attributes along with a myriad of Buffs & DoTs that interact in multifaceted ways. Manage five types of damage—Physical, Fire, Frost, Lightning, and Water—each with unique properties, to create tactical combinations that can decisively turn the tide of battle.

Key Features

  • Dual Firing Modes: Opt between manual precision for strategic strikes or auto-fire for optimal coverage.
  • Elemental Reactions: Utilize tactical advantages like slowing enemies with Water damage, or setting off chain reactions with Lightning against "Wet" foes.

  • Dynamic Level Progression: Choose from three randomly generated upgrades with each level-up to enhance your mutations and their combat effectiveness.

  • Unpredictable 3D Arenas: Every run introduces a new array of terrains, monsters, and bosses, crafted to ensure no two experiences are alike. Master the art of movement with jumping and rolling to navigate these challenging landscapes.
  • Rich Enemy Variety: Confront over 50 unique monsters and 12 daunting bosses that test your strategic acumen.

  • Comprehensive Customization: Adjust every battle element through 30 different settings to perfectly match your strategic preferences.
  • Achievement-Based Unlocks: Advance your capabilities by completing challenges that reward innovative play.

Experience optimized gameplay with a controller or keyboard and mouse, designed to deliver smooth performance on platforms like SteamDeck for a seamless and responsive gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes: The main character of this game is a biology experiment subject of a underground lab, His body can mutate into deadly weapons during the gameplay. There're also some blood spray visual effects when you kill the monsters.
